channel.title: 🏢 ITMO University on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 ITMO University on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Hybrid Generative AI for De Novo Design of Co-Crystals with Enhanced Tabletability
item.description: GEMCODE, a hybrid AI pipeline, automates co-crystal design for enhanced drug tabletability by combining deep generative models and evolutionary optimization, predicting numerous novel co-crystals.
